Declaration Class Reference

#include <Declaration.h>

Inheritance diagram for Declaration:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This is the parent of all declaration Abstract Syntax Tree nodes.

This class will not have direct instances. It only serves as the common parent class of:

  • ClassDeclaration,
  • FieldDeclarations,
  • MethodDeclaration,
  • ParameterDeclaration, and
  • VariableDeclaration
